jobDescription: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Product Manager to lead the development and strategy of innovative products. The ideal candidate will drive product vision, prioritize features, and collaborate cross-functionally with engineering, marketing, and design teams to deliver high-quality solutions. You will be responsible for defining product roadmaps, gathering and analyzing customer feedback, and ensuring the successful launch and continuous improvement of products. Strong leadership, strategic thinking, and excellent communication skills are essential for success in this role.
